item.title: first-child vs first-of-type
item.content:encoded:
The pseudo class â€œ:first-childâ€ is potentially unsafe when doing server-side rendering. Try changing it to â€œ:first-of-typeâ€.
The pseudo class â€œ:nth-childâ€ is potentially unsafe when doing server-side rendering. Try changing it to â€œ:nth-of-typeâ€.

item.title: cron í‘œí˜„ì‹
item.content:encoded:
Cron syntax has five fields separated by a space, and each field represents a unit of time.

â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ minute (0 - 59)
â”‚ â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ hour (0 - 23)
â”‚ â”‚ â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ day of the month (1 - 31)
â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ month (1 - 12 or JAN-DEC)
â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ day of the week (0 - 6 or SUN-SAT)
â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚
â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚
â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚
